text:
THE UNIVERSITY OF CONNECTICUT
STORRS. CONNECTICUT
June 11, 1958
Mr. Robert E. Iftiderwood, Jr.
NAEB Tape Network
University of Illinois
119 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Mr. Underwood,
Please excuse the delay in reply to your letter of May
26th. We are veiy happy that the NAEB Tape Network is able
to use the series, ’’Stretching Your Family Income”, with Dr.
Warren Bilkey.
We have already made corrections in program #1, as you
suggested. As soc»i as I hear from you concerning the open¬
ing and closing of each program, we*11 start preparing the
tapes for shipment to you for distribution in the fall. (I
can make any changes you wish in the opening and closing,
or leave it as is for your changes.)
Many thanks for your cooperation.
Mr. Don Nelson
Radio-Tv Supervisor
DN:cp
cc: John Schramm
